stack:stack.stack:script:
[Unit] Description=Stacki iptables starting and stopping After=network.target
[Service] Type=oneshot ExecStart=/usr/sbin/iptables-restore /etc/sysconfig/iptables ExecStop=/usr/sbin/iptables -F RemainAfterExit=true
[Install] WantedBy=multi-user.target
if [ -x /usr/bin/systemctl ] then /usr/bin/systemctl disable SuSEfirewall2 /usr/bin/systemctl disable SuSEfirewall2_init /usr/bin/systemctl disable ip6tables /usr/bin/systemctl enable iptables /usr/bin/systemctl enable stacki-iptables.service fi
